data.Speaker: Dr. Zhijian Lu
data.Synopsis: The speaker reviews the in vivo antibody generation process  and 3 major antibody discovery platforms

data.Webinar Title: Cell Line and Upstream Process Development for the Manufacture of Monoclonal Antibodies
data.Speaker: Dr. Zhong Liu
data.Synopsis: The speaker provides an overview of the strategic considerations in production cell line engineering, process design and operation, and considerations when using CHO cell lines.

data.Webinar Title: Regulatory and Quality Considerations for the US filing of Monoclonal Antibody and Related Products
data.Speaker: Dr. Audrey Jia
data.Synopsis: The speaker presents a summary of regulatory considerations for antibody products in different formats ( IgGs, ADCs and bispecific)

data.Webinar Title: Patenting Therapeutic Antibodies: Basics and Beyond
data.Speaker: Dr. Lin Sun-Hoffman
data.Synopsis: The speaker discusses ways to protect trade secrets and inventorship,   identification of an antibody invention, and finally presents case studies of antibody litigation in the US

data.Webinar Title: Design and conduct of clinical trials – a primer
data.Speaker: Dr. Yong-Jiang Hei
data.Synopsis: The speaker provides an overview of key areas in clinical trial design, including study site/investigator identification and selection, trial initiation, monitoring, safety reporting, data collection, analysis,  reporting, and data submission

data.Webinar Title: How to raise money from Venture Capitalists
data.Speaker: Dr. Jonathan Wang
data.Synopsis: Drawing from his 20+ years of experience in healthcare and life science investment, the speaker dicussses ways to raise fund and maintain a productive relationship with investors

data.Webinar Title: Optimization of Therapeutic Antibody Sequence – The Art of Balance
data.Speaker: Dr. Yue Liu
data.Synopsis: The speaker discusses  an "imbalanced" design of bispecific antibody with improved function and developability.
